extendedInfo.description: Trees and flowers are grooving in front of a clear bly sky and perfect white clouds. http://www.dfany.com

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works great for my S2. Love the simplicity of the theme but they should do more like settings of the sun according to the weather and time of the user would be awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks b\'ful
reviews.comment: Looks really cool.. I dunno abt other phones but its wrking fine on my galaxy y  5/5 *****
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes...wallpaper never sets
reviews.comment: This doesn\'t work on my motorola atrix 4G. When attempting to set the wallpaper it force closes. The wallpaper would probably be nice.......if it worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Totally fantastic and really makes you smile, however, having a perfect day would be lovely with a perfect nite
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Floating... Floaaaaaating.
reviews.comment: Would be nice, but as others said, the trees are floating in the sky on the left. HTC One X.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Happy place :)
reviews.comment: Very cute animation...Love the groove thing :) I do agree with others~wound be TOP app. if it had automatic time change, still I give 5 stars, gives you that warm and fuzzy feeling....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works fine on my LG Marquee. Makes everything feel happy and cheerful. Good for springtime.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Its so cheerful and colourful! Makes me smile every time I look at my phone.  And it\'s free.  Perfect :) thank you
reviews.author: Carol McCann

reviews.title: Problem
reviews.comment: There is a bug as Agnes attempt to set it as a wallpaper fails. Most of the time .
reviews.author: Nikhil Ranpara

reviews.comment: when i try to set it as wallpaper, it forces close. this thing is soo cute but it dnt work. hopefully it gets fixed. (g2)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I agree with Sarah, when you attempt to set as wallpaper, it doesn\'t set. Uninstall until issues resolved. HTC Incredible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too bad
reviews.comment: It keep force closing. Uninstall it. Too bad, because I liked the colorful animation. (I\'m using LG P970 Optimus Black)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never worked,
reviews.comment: force closes everytime I try. Motorola defy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I sincerely love the animation,BUT it was not working on my Sony Ericsson ARC! It could be previewed, however, could not work...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very simple & somehow the theme works very well. I wish the sky is little more brighter. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AAHHHH.
reviews.comment: looks great in the screen caps but won\'t work. On my Desire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Crashed everytime I tried to set it as wallpaper..... sent report.... no fix yet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seriously ,after all this time and this app still doesn\'t work. Are you kidding me?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on a Froyo HTC Desire. Loading this wallpaper takes me to the stock Sense Live Wallpaper.
reviews.author: A Google User
